title: Set-ConsoleSettings definition scheme
description: Settings used for the Set-ConsoleSettings cmdlet (https://github.com/lperezperez/Set-ConsoleSettings).

AutoLightMode.title: Auto light mode
AutoLightMode.description: Indicates whether the color scheme should be adapted to day/night light conditions.

ColorScheme.title: Color scheme
ColorScheme.description: Specifies the absolute path or the name of the color schema to use.

ContinuationPrompt.title: Continuation prompt
ContinuationPrompt.description: Specifies the string displayed at the beginning of the subsequent lines when multi-line input is entered.

CursorSize.title: Cursor size
CursorSize.description: Specifies the percentage of a character cell that is occupied by the cursor. This setting affects the default window.

FaceName.title: Font name
FaceName.description: Specifies the name of an alternate command window font. If the font name in empty, the system uses raster fonts.

FontFamily.title: True Type font
FontFamily.description: Specifies whether the font is True Type.

FontSize.title: Font size
FontSize.description: Specifies the size ([Width]x[Height]) of the command window font.

FontWeight.title: Font bold
FontWeight.description: Specifies whether the font is bold.

FullScreen.title: Full screen
FullScreen.description: Specifies whether the command window is set to open in full-screen mode.

HistoryBufferSize.title: Maximum history commands
HistoryBufferSize.description: Specifies the number of commands that can be stored in each command history buffer.

HistoryNoDup.title: Remove duplicated history commands
HistoryNoDup.description: Specifies whether to remove duplicated history entries.

InsertMode.title: Insert mode
InsertMode.description: Specifies whether the user types over existing characters.

LoadConIme.title: Load Console IME on logon
LoadConIme.description: Specifies whether the IME proxy process for the Windows 2000 console (Conime.exe) is loaded automatically when log on to Windows 2000.

NumberOfHistoryBuffers.title: Number of history buffers
NumberOfHistoryBuffers.description: Specifies the number of history buffers allocated to store commands.

OhMyPoshConfig.title: Oh My Posh configuration file
OhMyPoshConfig.description: Specifies the name or full path of the Oh My Posh configuration file.

PopupColors.title: Popup colors
PopupColors.description: Specifies both foreground and background colors used in popup windows by color name.

PROMPT.title: Prompt
PROMPT.description: Specifies the command prompt. %C (computer name) and %U (user name) can be used in order to extend the default prompt special character combinations (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/prompt#remarks)

QuickEdit.title: Quick edit
QuickEdit.description: Specifies whether user can cut and paste text by using the mouse.

ScreenBufferSize.title: Screen buffer size
ScreenBufferSize.description: Specifies the size of the screen buffer (the screen that is retained in memory). If the size of the screen displayed on the monitor is smaller than the screen buffer, its can be scrolled to see the entire screen.

ScreenColors.title: Main colors
ScreenColors.description: Specifies both foreground and background colors used in the console by color name.

WindowAlpha.title: Window transparency
WindowAlpha.description: Specifies the opacity of the console window (where 0 is transparent and 255 is opaque).

WindowSize.title: Screen size
WindowSize.description: Specifies the size of the screen in characters.
